rukus.text: dir mi worship nur my Lord mi neniam set any idols Him
dir mi ne posed potenc harm vi nor direkt vi
dir Ne 1 protekt me DI nor can mi trov any ali rifugx Him
Mi liver di proclamations messages Those disobey DI His messenger incur fajr Infer wherein ili abide forever
Once ili seg ki awaiting them ili do gxi trov out who est really weaker en potenc fewer en numer
dir mi ne kon ki promes vi okaz baldaux aux my Lord delay gxi por awhile
Li est Knower future Li ne reveal future anyone
Nur al messenger Li chooses does Li reveal preter future specif news
This est ascertain ti ili liver their Lord's messages Li est fully aware da ki ili hav. Li counted numer all ajx
